about_the_game:
Thomas is a young millionaire who gained fame and all his money thanks to the foundation of the Quest rooms network. He has all the attributes of a successful life: wealth, influence, favorite job. However, Thomas does not feel the colors of life, he is overcome by severe depression, money is just pieces of paper for him, success costs nothing. But soon he will have to feel a lot of new emotions, because he is the main suspect in the case of a maniac who kills according to the scenarios of "quest rooms"

"Voice over" is a visual novel that clearly demonstrates to its viewer the severity and ambiguity of mental problems. The plot is a metaphor for bipolar disorder, where wealth and luxury are a phase of mania, grandeur and contentment. And the main character himself has absorbed a phase of depression, frustration and detachment from the world. Also, the novel is not devoid of a detective element, the viewer will have to solve the mystery and decide which of the characters can be trusted.

— Catchy detective story with interactive elements.
— Well-developed characters of the characters.
— Experiences of a person subject to mental disorders.
— An oppressive atmosphere.
— Secrets and riddles.
— Unexpected plot twists.

All this is "Voice over".

name: Voice over

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "Voice over" is a visual novel about millionaire Thomas and a maniac terrorizing the city, made by a girl with bipolar disorder.
